headline.main: Bernie Sanders, Danny Glover: Union Workers Have It Better
headline.print_headline: Bernie Sanders, Danny Glover: Union Workers Have It Better

lead_paragraph: Vermont Sen. Bernie Sanders stood with thousands at a pro-union rally near Nissan Motor Co.'s plant in Canton, Mississippi, congratulating workers for their courage "in standing up for justice."
snippet: Vermont Sen. Bernie Sanders stood with thousands at a pro-union rally near Nissan Motor Co.'s plant in Canton, Mississippi, congratulating workers for their courage "in standing up for justice."...
